title: The Black Beast And The Night Flower
alternative_title: Kuroki Kemono to Yoru no Hana ; The Black Beast and the Night Flower ; 黒き獣と夜の花
status: Kuroki Kemono to Yoru no Hana ; The Black Beast and the Night Flower ; 黒き獣と夜の花
description:
Description :
        Mafia leader x Blind Florist Higashi, a candidate for the young leader of a gang entrenched in a violent world, meets Haruki, a blind young man, during a visit to a flower shop on his way to the previous leader's grave. What begins as a mere curiosity evolves into a deep and comforting connection. As their time together increases, Higashi's feelings shift from intrigue to intense desire for Haruki. This leads to a complex entanglement of obsession and passion.
